column4: would you know if the ati driver issue has been fixed in 9.04
I am using 9.04 with an ati card, but it worked out of the box and I don't use compiz, so not sure how good the driver is

i have an ati200m, its ancient and i have no idea if there are going to be open source drivers because of the rumours i have been hearing about ati dropping the support for cards older than the hd2000
I have no idea....mine worked out of the box and I never looked any closer
